message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and avoid the risk of inflation!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but it heavily favored you. Let's be fairer. This offer considers the future value of the money.
Bob, I'm aiming for a fair deal, but time is working against us. This is my final offer before the impact of inflation becomes too significant.
Alice, time is running out, and we both lose if we can't agree. I'm willing to be reasonable, but this needs to be a fair split. This offer is my compromise.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We both lose if this keeps up.  I'm making a serious concession here. Meet me halfway!
Alice, I'm holding firm to a fair split.  I've made a concession, let's close this deal before inflation hurts you even more.
Bob, this is my bottom line.  Take it or leave it.  We both know I'm being more than fair at this point!
